resources.string: Long coat Tokyo made of 90% wool. The product has a deflated armhole and two side pockets

Wool straight coat with cuts on the sleeves. The coat is made of 90% wool, which is ideal for basic demiseason wardrobe (some of our customers wear them all winter with a warm sweater) combined with shoes or sneakers.

Wool coat with oversized-silhouette, as if of "a man's shoulder." Model with dropped armholes and two patch pockets fastens with three metal buttons. Ideal for basic demiseason wardrobe (some of our customers wear them all winter with a warm sweater) combined with shoes or sneakers.

Wool coat with oversized-silhouette, as if of "a man's shoulder." Model with dropped armholes and two patch pockets fastens with three metal buttons. Ideal for basic demiseason wardrobe (some of our customers wear them all winter with a warm sweater) combined with shoes or sneakers.

Denim Jacket, perhaps, must-have of the coming season. Comfortable to wear, stylish and versatile denim jacket will create a variety of styles. The jacket can be worn with jeans, dresses and culottes.

Denim Jacket, perhaps, must-have of the coming season. Comfortable to wear, stylish and versatile denim jacket will create a variety of styles. The jacket can be worn with jeans, dresses and culottes.
A laconic base shirt of straight cut is an essential thing to have in any wardrobe. 100 % cotton.
A laconic white shirt of straight cut is an essential thing to have in any wardrobe. 100 % cotton.

Soft cozy sweater made of wool mixture (merino with acrylic) with a V-neck will become a favorite item of your basic wardrobe. Comfortable composition and refined simplicity and brevity of this sweater will emphasize refinement of any look.

Soft cozy sweater made of cotton, with a V-neck will become a favorite item of your basic wardrobe. Comfortable composition and refined simplicity and brevity of this sweater will emphasize refinement of any look.

Universal clothes for every day, perfect for late autumn and winter.Can be combined with sneakers or boots. Made of cotton fleece of the highest quality, unpretentious to wear and care for. It will take a worthy place in your fall and winter wardrobe.
Luxurious, perfect velvet dress decorated with elegant Italian lace, always pertinent: for holiday and everyday wear.
Light, airy tulle skirt is an irreplaceable thing in the wardrobe of every girl. Soft and comfortable tulle, and the neutral color of the skirt will let you create a lot of different looks.
Olive-colored Culottes made of 100% cotton. Excellent fit both with classic pumps and boots, and with rough boots and sneakers.
